name: ESCAPE TO WIN
description:
This game is in ALTERNATE UNIVERSE.

World War 2  starts  when you were staying in a hotel. 

US Army attacks that hotel.

 Now you must fight your way to escape the Hotel.

A game, filled with intense shooting for the fans of first person shooter games. 

Also includes a small puzzle ;)

★★ Enjoy the game ★★

Game Difficulty : Moderate.

Type : Full Version

Devloper : Pinak4444
